parameters: Would you like to clean it?
You can't seem to make out what the point of it is.
Your work with it is complete.
I see you've found your way from the entrance...
It's a shame, but many a soul have gotten lost in our lobby alone.
'Tis a shame... thought I would have someone to keep me company.
But, there's more important things, I guess...
I should get to why you're here.
See, I got word... and now, I'm not sure if it came from 'upstairs' or 'downstairs', per se...
But I got word that these paintings need cleaning.
I don't want to do the work myself.
So, it's a damn miracle you came along!
Well, 'bout seventy years since I've seen someone.
Your work will be VERY much appreciated.
Well, whacha' just staring at me for?
You want me to save your game, right?
I can do that for ya.
See... to answer your question, mate...
See, you haven't really done anything for me at this point.
Clean up some of them paintings, and it'll be a different story.
Remember, I'm always here if you gotta save.
You can't expect me to start blabbering on to ya without something in return!
Why don't you clean some of those paintings... Then we'll have a lil' chit chat.
Um... \.Walk around using the \fbarrow keys\fb or the \fbmouse\fb.
And... \.Interact with objects using the \fbspace bar\fb or the \fbmouse\fb!
When you wanna access the menu, or go back, do that by using the \fbescape key\fb or by \fbdouble tapping\fb.
Looks like you managed to help Ava move on.
Though, seeing that it was just a maze stroll and a heart-to-heart...
I'm a tad embarrassed I didn't do the job MYSELF.
Nevertheless... the amount of work you saved me is commendable, to say the least.
I know you must be chomping at the bit to hear about what's happening to you...
So I decided to field some pre-approved questions from ya.
Now, you've only cleaned ONE painting, so I won't be too loose-lipped...
But you should feel free to talk to me if ya wanna learn about what's going on.
And... if you hunger for more info... there's always those other two paintings.
Now, what can I help you with?
Now, what can I help you with?
For now, these are my pre-approved conversation topics...
I don't know anything about food. It just sounded like a nice thing for someone to ask me about...
Do you mind telling me about food?
Maybe you can help me decide.
A discus of dough... filled as it is with meats and cheeses...
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
Delectible slices of ground chuck... Nestled between vegetable rounds and puffy loaves...
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
A moist ball of filling, sometimes flesh, sometimes vegetables... and wrapped neatly in a flour-water wrapper.
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
A good piece of chopped animal bits... Arranged in bread form.
This truly is the ultimate all-around eating experience!
I would be proud to call that my favorite food!
A rolled pancake of maize... with delectable filling underneath.
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
So you must think that I need to KNOW about food to be asked about my favorite kind...
As for monster trucks... \. I know jack shit about them.
I would certainly know nothing of Grave Digger, with its 540 cubic inch Merlin 1450hp Engine, and Coan 2-speed transmission...
Or the fact that it can often steal the show from my personal favorite... Overkill Evolution...
Charon seems to know more about monster trucks than he is letting on...
Um... .\ Walk around using the \fbarrow keys\fb or the \fbmouse\fb.
And... .\ Interact with objects using the \fbspace bar\fb or the \fbmouse\fb!
When you wanna access the menu, or go back, do that by using the \fbescape key\fb or by \fbdouble tapping\fb.
Looks like you managed to help the little one move on...
I must say, I didn't think you had it in ya.
That kid was a real sob story... glad I didn't have to get involved.
You know, I'm uncomfortable around that kinda stuff...
But, anyway... you really took a load of my shoulders by doing that.
I'm feeling like we could be very good friends.
And you know what friends do for each other...
I think it's finally time I begin to tell you what's going on...
So feel free to talk to me about it.
Now, what can I help you with?
Now, what can I help you with?
Looks like you managed to help Ava move on.
Though, seeing that it was just a maze stroll and a heart-to-heart...
I'm a tad embarrassed I didn't do the job MYSELF.
Nevertheless... the amount of work you saved me is commendable, to say the least.
I know you must be chomping at the bit to hear about what's happening to you...
Is there anything you want to learn about?
For now, these are my pre-approved conversation topics...
I don't know anything about food. It just sounded like a nice thing for someone to ask me about...
Do you mind telling me about food?
Maybe you can help me decide.
A discus of dough... filled as it is with meats and cheeses...
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
Delectible slices of ground chuck... Nestled between vegetable rounds and puffy loaves...
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
A moist ball of filling, sometimes flesh, sometimes vegetables... and wrapped neatly in a flour-water wrapper.
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
A good piece of chopped animal bits... Arranged in bread form.
This truly is the ultimate all-around eating experience!
I would be proud to call that my favorite food!
A rolled pancake of maize... with delectable filling underneath.
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
So you must think that I need to KNOW about food to be asked about my favorite kind...
As for monster trucks... \. I know jack shit about them.
I would certainly know nothing of Grave Digger, with its 540 cubic inch Merlin 1450hp Engine, and Coan 2-speed transmission...
Or the fact that it can often steal the show from my personal favorite... Overkill Evolution...
Charon seems to know more about monster trucks than he is letting on...
That is certainly an interesting question to ask.
Let me put it this way...
Maybe, in another life... The Charon you know would be the captain of a boat.
Not a big boat, mind you... I can't say I'm a freighter kind of guy.
But maybe... a canoe. A long one...
And on this canoe, I'd take people around, bring them where they need to be.
I feel like that sums it up pretty well.
Heh. \.Could ask the same question myself...
There is an 'upstairs', and a 'downstairs' in this world.
But if you noticed, when you came in... you were sent every which way: down, up, and down again...
See, this place... it's somewhere inbetween.
It's for people whose fates are somewhat... \.Hard to decide.
No endless hellfire, and no heavenly banquets either...
It's no wonder a place like this is so stock-still... A little boring, if you ask me.
Um... .\ Walk around using the \fbarrow keys\fb or the \fbmouse\fb.
And... .\ Interact with objects using the \fbspace bar\fb or the \fbmouse\fb!
When you wanna access the menu, or go back, do that by using the \fbescape key\fb or by \fbdouble tapping\fb.
I see the monster has moved on...
Listen... \.as you may already know... \.I very willingly put you at great risk of losing life and limb just now.
But... and this is a big BUT!
I did it with good reason.
See, you may think I'm some kind of lazy bum... but I was once a spring chicken, like you.
And back then, I tried to clean that damn painting myself.
However, I soon reached a point where I knew that staying any longer would certainly result in my death.
If that were to happen... \. who would be here to guide people along, save their game, and give them moral encouragement?
And... \.look at where that choice brought me!
You were able to get that poor soul to move on, and all with my help.
Now, I know you may still be very justifiably angry at me right now, and I want to assure you: \.your feelings are valid.
However... \.I think I know of a way I can make it up to ya.
I'll tell you about things I never tell ANYONE who steps foot in here.
And that isn't just 'cause you're the first one to survive that painting, mind you!
Just give me a talking to if you're interested.
Now, what can I help you with?
Now, what can I help you with?
Looks like you managed to help Ava move on.
Though, seeing that it was just a maze stroll and a heart-to-heart...
I'm a tad embarrassed I didn't do the job MYSELF.
Nevertheless... the amount of work you saved me is commendable, to say the least.
It seems like you managed to help the little one move on...
I must say, I didn't think you had it in ya.
That kid was a real sob story... glad I didn't have to get involved.
You know, I'm uncomfortable around that kinda stuff...
But, anyway... you really took a load of my shoulders by doing that.
I'm feeling like we could be very good friends.
And you know what friends do for each other...
Is there anything you want to learn about?
For now, these are my pre-approved conversation topics...
I don't know anything about food. It just sounded like a nice thing for someone to ask me about...
Do you mind telling me about food?
Maybe you can help me decide.
A discus of dough... filled as it is with meats and cheeses...
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
Delectible slices of ground chuck... Nestled between vegetable rounds and puffy loaves...
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
A moist ball of filling, sometimes flesh, sometimes vegetables... and wrapped neatly in a flour-water wrapper.
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
A good piece of chopped animal bits... Arranged in bread form.
This truly is the ultimate all-around eating experience!
I would be proud to call that my favorite food!
A rolled pancake of maize... with delectable filling underneath.
It sounds good, but I'm not sure if that would be my favorite.
So you must think that I need to KNOW about food to be asked about my favorite kind...
Listen, pal... we know each other well enough now.
I guess I can admit it... I really love monster trucks.
I don't know why... nor can I reason about how someone like me knows what a 'monster truck' is.
Nevertheless, I think they're super neat.
We'll go out and watch a monster truck show together.
I've always wanted to do that...
That is certainly an interesting question to ask.
Let me put it this way...
Maybe, in another life... The Charon you know would be the captain of a boat.
Not a big boat, mind you... I can't say I'm a freighter kind of guy.
But maybe... a broad bottom. You know what that is, right?
And on this broad bottom, I'd take people around, bring them where they need to be.
I feel like that sums it up pretty well.
Heh. \.Could ask the same question myself...
There is an 'upstairs', and a 'downstairs' in this world.
But if you noticed, when you came in... you were sent every which way: down, up, and down again...
See, this place... it's somewhere inbetween.
It's for people whose fates are somewhat... \.Hard to decide.
No endless hellfire, and no heavenly banquets either...
It's no wonder a place like this is so stock-still... A little boring, if you ask me.
You're really making me think HARD, pal.
See... when someone walks in here... \. It's not like I know all about 'em.
I have this feeling of what they did... their past... but it's just that: a feeling.
Let me put it this way...
Do you know when... when you wake up... you can remember your dream, but only parts of it?
And those parts, what you do remember... sometimes they can be real hazy.
All I have is this collection of bits and bobs... and they're all muddied up.
But I can try to make sense of them for you. Because you're my friend.
You were a person who likes to figure out what's up from down.
A detective, perhaps... or maybe just someone who likes puzzle games.
You were always in for a good fright, too.
And... \.you sought out things that were strange.
I don't even know what MY purpose is, man! How am I gonna know yours?
Well, I guess I'm the one who put this down as a conversation topic...
And you ARE my friend now...
I figure I do owe you at least an attempt at explaining this stuff.
Your purpose isn't too different than those of the people you dealt with.
See, um...\. how do I put this...
This place has a habit of keeping people still, and silent, letting the days blend together...
Until they are able to move on, that is.
And while you think that you're different... \.I don't know...
You very well might be in a standstill of your own.
But... I have an inkling that there's a way out of it. Just like there was for the people in the paintings...
And I also have an inkling that... well, you know exactly what to do next.
What I'm saying is this, friend:
If we don't see each other on the other side... I bid you farewell.
I've had a hell of a time helping you out.

When you wanna access the menu, or go back, do that by using the \fbescape key\fb or by \fbdouble tapping\fb.

No matter how hard you try, you can't seem to clean it just yet...

Your work with it is complete.
I would \fbsave\fb with me before ya head in... heheh.
No matter how hard you try, you can't seem to clean it just yet...

Would you like to clean it?
Your work with it is complete.
